steps.textEntry: adb -s emulator-5554 shell input touchscreen swipe  462 1497 462 0 1434

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Open this for instructions. To create a new note, tap the blue Add Note button. To search your notes, tap the search button in the Action Bar and enter any text. Simplenote will show you matching results instantly. Got a really important note? Press the pin button
